description: This file defines a React functional component called TopBar, responsible for displaying the game title, timer, move count, and control buttons (Start, Reset, Restart) based on the game state.

methods.name: TopBar({ seconds, onReset, movesCount, started, completed, onStart, onRestart })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the top control bar for the game, including timer, move count, and control buttons.

ctags.name: TopBar
ctags.signature: ({ seconds, onReset, movesCount, started, completed, onStart, onRestart })
